Package a12345678.change.to.your.matriculation.number

Class Scroll

Object
MagicItem
Scroll
All Implemented Interfaces:
MagicEffectRealization, MagicSource, Tradeable
public class Scroll extends MagicItem
A Scroll object contains a spell that can be read by someone. The scroll provides the necessary mana and magic level even if the user's capabilities would not be sufficient to cast the spell

    useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
    If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and cast the spell using this as magic source and parameter target as target

  • Constructor Details

    • Scroll

      public Scroll (String name, int usages, int price, int weight, Spell spell)
      Parameters:
      name - name
      usages - number of usages still left
      price - price
      weight - weight
      spell - spell that is written on the scroll and can therefore be cast

  • Method Details

    • additionalOutputString

      public String additionalOutputString()
      Returns "; casts 'spell'". e.g. (total result of toString) "[Scroll of doom; 1 g; 100 Knuts; 5 usages; casts [Bombarda(**): 20 mana; -50 % HP]]"
      Overrides:
      additionalOutputString in class MagicItem
      Returns:
      "; casts 'spell'"

    • useOn

      public void useOn (MagicEffectRealization target)
      If usages is greater than 0 reduce usages by 1 (tryUsage method) and cast the spell using this as magic source and parameter target as target
      Parameters:
      target - target of the spell cast by reading the scroll
